UnitDefinition.Name: PBK output resolution time unit

Unit.Name: Minutes
Unit.Description: PBK simulation output resolution is specified in minutes.

Unit.Name: Hours
Unit.Description: PBK simulation output resolution is specified in hours.

Unit.Name: Days
